fn.p: All information appearing in the Industry Update was supplied by manufacturers’ press releases and edited for length by the publisher. Publication of information and resources in the Industry Update does not imply AADE or publisher endorsement of products or services.

permissions.copyright-holder: American Association of Diabetes Educators; Published by SAGE Publications

sec.title: CinSulin
sec.p: CinSulin® water extract of cinnamon is a natural and clinically studied ingredient for managing blood sugar levels.+* CinSulin uses a patented water extraction process to gently concentrate the beneficial water-soluble components in the plant and largely remove the unwanted fat-soluble components. The end result is the safest cinnamon extract on the market, with a concentration ratio of 10:1 compared with common cinnamon. This means you’d have to take ten 500-mg common cinnamon capsules to get the same benefits of two 250-mg CinSulin capsules. CinSulin has 5 human clinical studies and a meta-analysis validating its ability to lower fasting blood sugar by as much as 10% and increase insulin sensitivity.+* Available in 3 formulas—One Per Day, Advanced Strength, and Healthy Weight. Visit www.cinsulin.com for more information and a list of retail stores carrying CinSulin.
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

sec.title: Nada Cran-Raspberry
sec.p: Healthier Drinks?—Nada problem! Nada Beverage Company Inc has launched a new line of “functional” noncarbonated beverages called Nada. The patented ingredients in Nada have been shown in clinical studies to reduce bad LDL cholesterol, increase good HDL cholesterol, reduce triglycerides, and help you lose weight 3 times greater than diet and exercise alone when used with a healthy diet and exercise program. Nada has no sugar, calories, carbohydrates, caffeine, aspartame, or stimulants. Nada has an all-natural dietary supplement that helps suppress appetite and contains other natural and artificial ingredients. Nada works with your body’s own natural fat burner—insulin, which helps metabolize fat. Nada Beverage Company Inc has developed 4 flavors; Black Cherry, Peach, Strawberry-Kiwi, and Cran Raspberry, available in 20-ounce plastic bottles. For more information, see www.nadabev.com or contact Nada Beverage Company Inc, 1063 Treadstone Lane, Powder Springs, GA 30127; (770) 439-9697.

sec.title: Diabetes MyPlate Poster for Learning ZoneXpress
sec.p: Choose healthy foods with diabetes in mind with the Diabetes MyPlate Poster. This poster features an adaptation of the USDA food pyramid replacement, MyPlate, to show foods divided in a diabetes-friendly guide. Foods are categorized by adapted food groups: fruits, nonstarchy vegetables, protein, dairy, and starchy vegetables, grains, and legumes. The Diabetes MyPlate poster addresses the significance of carbohydrates in a diabetic diet as well as the importance of daily physical activity and reducing the amount of solid fats, added sugars, and salt in your diet. The poster is 18 × 24 inches, laminated. Diabetes MyPlate Handouts also available. © 2013 Learning ZoneXpress. Item #411010. $14.95. For more information, contact Toni Meyer—Marketing Manager: (888) 455-7003; toni@learningzonexpress.com; www.learningzonexpress.com.

sec.title: Hear the Difference of Glucocard Reliability
sec.p: The GLUCOCARD Expression is an audio-enabled blood glucose monitoring system that includes bilingual voice options for hearing test results. Oversized picture icons and large tactile buttons make this meter easy to use. Testing is more comfortable with a small sample size and alternative site testing. Accurate and reliable test results are displayed in 6 seconds. http://www.glucocardusa.com/expression.html; (800) 848-0614.

sec.title: Trueresult® and True2go® Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems and TRUEtest™ Strips
sec.p: TRUEresult® and TRUE2go® Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems and TRUEtest™ Strips from Nipro Diagnostics Inc offer affordable, no-coding diabetes testing technology.

list-item.p: TRUEresult® offers no-coding performance with a state-of-the-art design for accurate, easy, everyday testing at home.
TRUE2go® twists onto a vial of test strips and offers true convenience for your patients on the go.
State-of-the-art TRUEtest™ Strips feature Quad-Electrode Laser Accuracy for enhanced precision and accuracy of test results.

sec.p: Both the TRUEresult® and TRUE2go® Systems offer no coding, a 0.5-µL sample size, as fast as 4-second test time, and easy, strip release. Most important, both systems have been clinically proven accurate and precise, as defined by the ISO Standard, and received positive ratings on ease of use from patients with diabetes. Together, these two high quality, advanced-performance systems better fit your patients’ active lifestyles and make it easier and more affordable for them to take better control of their diabetes. For more information, contact Ms Teri Sasse, RN, MS, Global Director, Professional and Clinical Services, Nipro Diagnostics Inc, 2400 NW 55th Court, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33309; (800) 342-7226, ext. 4223; tsasse@niprodiagnostics.com; www.niprodiagnostics.com.
